overview: Artist Alexander Chursin creates portraits of rappers of the caliber of Notorious B.I.G. and Earl Sweatshirt in the spirit of paintings by old masters, giving the stars of hip-hop images of icons. Observations of his work and Chursin's arguments about the Renaissance, the relevance of painting and the spirit of the 90s-in the film, which was shot for almost a year against the backdrop of post-apocalyptic landscapes of Eastern Europe.
title: Chursin
